heroData.description: I am passionate about technology and implementing incredible solutions and designs using:

aboutItems.text: I am a Systems Engineering student and I currently reside in Peru.

Within the stacks that I handle, I like to work mainly with React, Node.js (with Express) and with one of the technologies with which I interact the most and I think it has a lot of potential: Next.js.
I am a true believer that we never stop learning, which is why I am always trying new technologies. I was recently testing Vue.js.

projectsData.title: Juego El OSO
projectsData.description: Juego en el que debes formar la mayor cantidad de palabras OSO posible antes de que te gane el computador. ¿Podrás ganarle?
